HomePage.title: Hello, I am
HomePage.paragraph: Every project is an opportunity to create something unique. I'm completely committed to my professional development and have a great willingness to face new challenges. Collaboration is key to transforming ideas into extraordinary results, and I'm ready to work with passionate people. Let's build something memorable together!

About.title: About me
About.paragraph: I'm a junior frontend developer passionate about creating responsive, user-friendly websites. Through self-study, I have developed strong skills in web technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and more. Currently, I am expanding my knowledge with game development in Unity, combining my web experience with a creative approach to problem-solving. I'd love to connect with people who share this same passion.

Email.title: let's Connect
Email.paragraph: ¡Las grandes cosas comienzan con un simple saludo! Si eres un reclutador, un entusiasta de la tecnología o un socio creativo, me encantaría saber de ti. Exploremos cómo podemos hacer realidad ideas audaces juntos.
Email.subject: Subject
